Introducing YT Search, a powerful Google Chrome extension that lets you quickly and easily search for videos on YouTube without leaving the tab that you are in. With just a few clicks of the keyboard (Ctrl+Y), you can access the extension's search bar and enter your desired keywords. Once you hit enter, you'll be seamlessly redirected to YouTube's search results page, where you can explore all the relevant videos.

In addition to its speedy search functionality, YT Search also offers a sleek and customizable interface. Users can toggle between light and dark modes, depending on their preferences and viewing environment. This intuitive extension is perfect for anyone who wants to streamline their YouTube searches and optimize their video watching experience.

About 1C2D Software

   We are an independent software developer team just starting out in the industry. Our small but dedicated team is passionate about creating innovative and user-friendly apps that make people's lives easier and more enjoyable.

We are focused on delivering high-quality products that meet the needs of our public. Our goal is to build a reputation for excellence and establish ourselves as a trusted developer team.

We are excited to be on this journey and look forward to sharing our creations with you. We also love public feedback on our apps so we can continually improve them. Feel free to comment on the features or possible features you want to see in this app.
